PATIENT_ID: TEST_DVT_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-15 08:30:00

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-15 10:00:00
Patient admitted for chest pain. Developed left leg swelling and pain on hospital day 2.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-17 14:30:00
VENOUS DUPLEX LEFT LOWER EXTREMITY

FINDINGS:
Acute deep vein thrombosis involving the left popliteal and femoral veins.
Echogenic thrombus with incomplete compressibility.

IMPRESSION:
Acute DVT left lower extremity.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-17 15:00:00
Patient diagnosed with acute DVT left leg. Started on anticoagulation with heparin drip.
DVT developed during hospitalization, not present on arrival per nursing notes.

[LAB] 2026-01-17 15:30:00
D-dimer: 3500 ng/mL (elevated)
